title: Louis Walsh reveals Simon Cowell 'made him' get a facelift
text:
Louis has undergone treatments such as an eyelift and teeth whitening (Picture: Rex)

Louis Walsh has revealed that Simon Cowell told him to get a facelift, ahead of the series premiere of the celebrity edition of The X Factor.

The TV talent judge has confessed to undergoing a set of cosmetic procedures from an eyelift to teeth whitening, as he claimed that Simon was the inspiration behind him going under the knife.

Speaking to Mail Online, the 67-year-old said: ‘First Simon made me have my eye bags done. I went to Sharon’s [Osbourne] man for that – and she knows all the best surgeons. Then Simon got on about my hair.

‘So I went to a lovely fellow who took some hair off the back of my head and put it on the top. So it’s actually your own hair just put back in the right place.

‘And then there’s the teeth. I’ve had my teeth whitened, but everybody does that now. And that’s it.’

Louis is making his third return to the judging panel of The X Factor, after previously leaving the show in both 2015 and 2018 respectively.

This time around, he admits he was not surprised that he was given the axe from the show initially, but is more than happy to be able to come back.

‘I’ve had more comebacks than Frank Sinatra,’ he joked.

‘The first time I got a bit of a shock but I sort of knew it was coming. You have to keep changing things up. I’ve been in this business all my life. I get it.

‘Everything has a lifespan. Everything needs tweaking to keep it current. But it’s good to be back. I love being back with Simon. There’s something completely addictive about him.’

The Irishman also says that he wants to be able to prove critics and viewers wrong with the celebrity format of the ITV singing competition, in which he will judge a lineup of celebrity talent alongside Simon and Nicole Scherzinger.

And he promises that there will be some surprises in store.

‘He’s [Simon] turned the whole thing on its head,’ he added.

‘It’s upbeat, it’s entertaining. People will not believe it when they hear someone like Martin Bashir sing.’

The X Factor: Celebrity starts on 12 October at 8:35pm.
